sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Populate Displayname of Ledger Accounts</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord(FinCommonConstants.SYS_CLASS_GL_ACCOUNT);
gr.addNullQuery('display_name');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    try {
        var extPoints = new GlideScriptedExtensionPoint().getExtensions('GLAccountDisplayNameExtension');
        extPoints.forEach(function(ep) {
            if (ep.handle(gr.erp_source))
                ep.process(gr);
        });
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Error running GLAccountDisplayNameExtension extension points");
        throw ex;
    }
    gr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-11-14 10:07:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>039e5a6e0f8100106c4b3980b8767e9b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Populate Displayname of Ledger Accounts</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_039e5a6e0f8100106c4b3980b8767e9b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-11-21 09:27:53</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
